Control Name: 1.8.8 Public IPs and orphaned NICs are regularly cleaned up.
Control Statement: There's a difference in billing for regular and static public IP addresses. There should be a process to look for orphan network interface cards (NICs) and PIPs that are not being used in production and non-production.
